name: Canon Europe Ltd.
bossPosition: Chief Legal, Intellectual Property and Sustainability
goal:
Canon Europe is a subsidiary of Canon Inc. of Japan, a world-leading innovator and provider of solutions and services for Business Imaging (IT products, solutions and services for office and professional print environments), Consumer Imaging (consumer photo and video, printers, scanners, fax machines and consumer multifunction devices), Medical Imaging (digital radiography and ophthalmology) and Professional Imaging (professional photo and video, projectors, photofinishing, network cameras and broadcast solutions). Canon’s corporate philosophy is Kyosei – ‘living and working together for the common good’.

Canon Europe employs around 19,000 people across Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA) with operations in approximately 120 markets throughout the region. Its headquarters are in Stockley Park, Uxbridge, near London.

We pursue sustainable business growth, focusing on reducing the company's own environmental impact and supporting customers to reduce theirs using Canon’s products, solutions and services. Canon has achieved global certification to ISO 14001.
